Pakistan beggar found unconscious with over PKR 5 lakh, Saudi passport in pocket
content: An elderly beggar was discovered unconscious on Khushab Road in Pakistan's Sargodha district with over Rs 0.5 million in his pocket by the Rescue 1122 team. He had PKR 534,000 and a passport showing multiple trips to Saudi Arabia. ​​Upon discharge from the hospital, he retrieved his money and belongings, according to Geo News.
summary: An elderly beggar was discovered unconscious on Khushab Road in Pakistan's Sargodha district with over Rs 0.5 million in his pocket by the Rescue 1122 team. He had PKR 534,000 and a passport showing multiple trips to Saudi Arabia. ​​Upon discharge from the hospital, he retrieved his money and belongings, according to Geo News.

title: Who Is Tim Walz? Minnesota governor stirring interest in Kamala Harris’ VP search
Spain: EU court rules against regional wolf hunting plan
content: The European Court of Justice (ECJ) ruling stipulated that the wolf may not be designated as a species for hunting at a regional level as long as its conservation status at a national level is "unfavorable."
summary: The European Court of Justice (ECJ) ruling stipulated that the wolf may not be designated as a species for hunting at a regional level as long as its conservation status at a national level is "unfavorable."

title: Woman dealing with 'mental health crisis' shot by police after 911 call
content: New Jersey's attorney general has launched an investigation into the fatal shooting of a woman by police in Fort Lee. Responding to a 911 call about a mental health crisis, officers were involved in a confrontation that led to the woman being shot. The incident, which has sparked public outrage, occurred despite the absence of the state's Arrive Together programme in Fort Lee.
summary: New Jersey's attorney general has launched an investigation into the fatal shooting of a woman by police in Fort Lee. Responding to a 911 call about a mental health crisis, officers were involved in a confrontation that led to the woman being shot. The incident, which has sparked public outrage, occurred despite the absence of the state's Arrive Together programme in Fort Lee.

title: Joe Biden proposes sweeping US Supreme Court reforms
content: President Joe Biden proposed reforms to the US Supreme Court to restore public trust. He suggested an 18-year term for justices, a binding ethics code, and a constitutional amendment to limit presidential immunity. Biden criticized recent court decisions eroding public confidence and emphasized that no one, including ex-presidents, is above the law.
summary: President Joe Biden proposed reforms to the US Supreme Court to restore public trust. He suggested an 18-year term for justices, a binding ethics code, and a constitutional amendment to limit presidential immunity. Biden criticized recent court decisions eroding public confidence and emphasized that no one, including ex-presidents, is above the law.

How a flaming car led to one of biggest fires in California's history
content: The Park Fire in the Sierra Nevada foothills, potentially sparked by an act of arson involving a flaming car pushed into a ravine, has rapidly grown to become California’s sixth-largest fire. This rapid expansion was due to several factors that had been building over the years. Two consecutive wet winters resulted in abundant grass and brush growth, which was then dried out by summer heatwaves, creating ideal fire conditions.
summary: The Park Fire in the Sierra Nevada foothills, potentially sparked by an act of arson involving a flaming car pushed into a ravine, has rapidly grown to become California’s sixth-largest fire. This rapid expansion was due to several factors that had been building over the years. Two consecutive wet winters resulted in abundant grass and brush growth, which was then dried out by summer heatwaves, creating ideal fire conditions.

title: 'Ahem Google!': Kamala Harris headlines in Trump searches? What Elon Musk said
content: Elon Musk criticized Google for showing Kamala Harris in search results when users searched for Donald Trump. He suggested Google might be censoring Trump-related news ahead of the US elections. Musk also shared user posts claiming Google's positive bias towards censorship. In response, Google stated no manual actions were taken to alter search results.
summary: Elon Musk criticized Google for showing Kamala Harris in search results when users searched for Donald Trump. He suggested Google might be censoring Trump-related news ahead of the US elections. Musk also shared user posts claiming Google's positive bias towards censorship. In response, Google stated no manual actions were taken to alter search results.

title: North Korea seeks medicines for Kim Jong Un's health problems: Seoul
Failed North Korea satellite launch engine points to Russian role, say South Korean lawmakers
content: The NIS informed lawmakers that there were no signs North Korea had developed the liquid oxygen and kerosene engine. Lee Seong-kweun, a member of the parliamentary intelligence committee, stated, "Given that liquid oxygen and kerosene were used in the engine for the first time, they had likely received Russian support."
summary: The NIS informed lawmakers that there were no signs North Korea had developed the liquid oxygen and kerosene engine. Lee Seong-kweun, a member of the parliamentary intelligence committee, stated, "Given that liquid oxygen and kerosene were used in the engine for the first time, they had likely received Russian support."

Internet thinks JD Vance wears eyeliner, makeup artist says 'possible'
content: JD Vance's eye makeup is one thing people are searching on the internet with videos on how to create smoky eyes like JD Vance going viral on TikTok. Social media users are convinced that JD Vance uses some kind of eye make up, including an eyeliner, to accentuate his blue eyes for the camera.
summary: JD Vance's eye makeup is one thing people are searching on the internet with videos on how to create smoky eyes like JD Vance going viral on TikTok. Social media users are convinced that JD Vance uses some kind of eye make up, including an eyeliner, to accentuate his blue eyes for the camera.

title: 'Trump gunman was seen 90 mins before shooting'
content: Thomas Crooks, who attempted to kill Donald Trump on July 13, was identified by police over an hour before the shooting. FBI's Kevin Rojek stated that officers spotted Crooks using a range finder and browsing news sites. Moments later, Crooks fired eight rounds before being neutralized. Trump will give a victim's interview to provide his perspective.
summary: Thomas Crooks, who attempted to kill Donald Trump on July 13, was identified by police over an hour before the shooting. FBI's Kevin Rojek stated that officers spotted Crooks using a range finder and browsing news sites. Moments later, Crooks fired eight rounds before being neutralized. Trump will give a victim's interview to provide his perspective.

title: FDA approves blood test method for colon cancer screening
content: The FDA approved Guardant Health's Shield blood test for colon cancer screening, making it likely to be covered by Medicare and private insurers. It is effective at detecting later-stage cancers but not early-stage polyps. A positive result requires follow-up with a colonoscopy. Doctors see potential for increased screening rates, but its impact on reducing mortality remains to be seen.
summary: The FDA approved Guardant Health's Shield blood test for colon cancer screening, making it likely to be covered by Medicare and private insurers. It is effective at detecting later-stage cancers but not early-stage polyps. A positive result requires follow-up with a colonoscopy. Doctors see potential for increased screening rates, but its impact on reducing mortality remains to be seen.

title: Ex-wife of Kamala Harris husband now slams Megyn Kelly: 'WTF is this'
content: ​Douglas Emhoff's first wife Kerstin Emhoff is all there for Kamala Harris. She shielded her where she was attacked for being childless and said her two children were co-parented by Kamala after Kamala and her ex-husband married. Now she has hit out at journalist Megyn Kelly as Megyn said Kamala supports "sterilization and mutilation of perfectly healthy minor children".
summary: ​Douglas Emhoff's first wife Kerstin Emhoff is all there for Kamala Harris. She shielded her where she was attacked for being childless and said her two children were co-parented by Kamala after Kamala and her ex-husband married. Now she has hit out at journalist Megyn Kelly as Megyn said Kamala supports "sterilization and mutilation of perfectly healthy minor children".
